reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Build resilience and strengthen livelihoods of ethnic communities in Colombia (Country Strategic Plan)
Stärkung der Widerstandsfähigkeit und der Lebensgrundlagen ethnischer Gemeinschaften in Kolumbien (Länderstrategie)

description.narrative: Maßnahmen sind zum einen Capacity Development Aktivitäten, wie die Stärkung der lokalen Strukturen, des Weiteren verstärkte Einbeziehung von Frauen sowie traditionellem Wissen für den Umweltschutz. Vor allem aber kommen konditionierte Transferleistungen (Cash for Assets) im Bereich Wiederaufforstung, Wassermanagement und Ernährung zum Einsatz.

Measures are on the one hand Capacity Development Activities, like strengthening the local structures, reinforced inclusion of women as well as from traditional knowledge for the environment protection in the processes. Above all, however, conditioned transfer achievements (Cash for Assets) are used in the area of reforestation, water management and food.

Measures are on the one hand Capacity Development Activities, like strengthening the local structures, reinforced inclusion of women as well as from traditional knowledge for the environment protection in the processes. Above all, however, conditioned transfer achievements (Cash for Assets) are used in the area of reforestation, water management and food.
